mapper.select: SELECT user.user_buddha AS userBuddha, user.user_name AS userName, user.user_email AS userEmail, user.user_sex AS userSex, user.user_birthday AS userBirthday, user.user_city AS userCity, user.user_signature AS userSignature, role.role_name AS roleName FROM tbl_user AS user LEFT JOIN tbl_power AS power ON user.user_email = power.power_email LEFT JOIN tbl_role AS role ON role.role_uuid = power.power_role LEFT JOIN tbl_cipher AS cipher ON cipher.cipher_email = user.user_email WHERE cipher.cipher_email = #{account} AND cipher_password = #{password};

SELECT user.user_uuid AS userUuid, user.user_buddha AS userBuddha, user.user_name AS userName, user.user_email AS userEmail, user.user_sex AS userSex, user.user_birthday AS userBirthday, user.user_city AS userCity, user.user_signature AS userSignature, user.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, user.gmt_modified AS gmtModified FROM tbl_user AS user WHERE user.user_email = #{email} LIMIT 1;
